Title: Establishes a committee to study the housing aspect of tourism in the state of New York
Summary: Establishes a committee to study the housing aspect of tourism in the state of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a study committee on the housing aspect of tourism in the state of New York; and to amend chapter 225 of the laws of 2010, amending the multiple dwelling law and the administrative code of the city of New York relating to clarifying certain provisions relating to occupancy of class A multiple dwellings, in relation to postponing the effective date thereof
